creator: Simon Lazarus 84
title: Altaar Ascii
description: Altaar Ascii is an interactive installation featuring a totemic sculpture with light projections and an interactive audio loop. The audio loop is affected by the luminosity detected by a webcam, creating an immersive experience where light and sound interact.
steps: Construct the totemic sculpture using painted wood and extruded polystyrene foam. Cut the bird shape with a CNC machine and other elements (elephant and black sun) with woodworking saws.
Create the video stream using Adobe After Effects.
Set up the mapped projection using MadMapper.

Create the interactive audio loop using PureData, integrating input from a webcam. Use the webcam's luminosity data as a variable to control the sound, allowing the audio to change based on the light levels.
